description: The user asks PropScout AI to schedule viewings for three shortlisted Boston properties on the same day. The assistant uses the schedule_viewing tool three times, creates calendar events, and returns a confirmation summary to the user.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve data, calculate ROI, generate reports, schedule viewings, and communicate with the user. Always confirm actions and provide clear summaries.

I have three homes in Boston I want to view on Saturday, March 23, 2025, at 10 am, 1 pm, and 3 pm respectively. The addresses are 123 Main St, Boston, MA 02108; 456 Beacon St, Boston, MA 02215; and 789 Commonwealth Ave, Boston, MA 02135. Please schedule them and send me the calendar invites.
Sure, I’m creating calendar events for each property and will send you the invites shortly.
Calendar event created for 123 Main St on 2025-03-23 at 10:00 AM (60 min). Invitation sent to you and agent123@listing.com.
Calendar event created for 456 Beacon St on 2025-03-23 at 1:00 PM (60 min). Invitation sent to you and agent456@listing.com.
Calendar event created for 789 Commonwealth Ave on 2025-03-23 at 3:00 PM (60 min). Invitation sent to you and agent789@listing.com.

All three viewings have been scheduled and calendar invitations have been sent to your email and the respective listing agents:

- **123 Main St** – 10:00 AM – 11:00 AM
- **456 Beacon St** – 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM
- **789 Commonwealth Ave** – 3:00 PM – 4:00 PM

You should see the events appear in your calendar shortly. Let me know if you need anything else, such as property details, ROI estimates, or a follow‑up report.
